Tyrael was more or less away from the base and tried to close in while 
flying.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> Kyle, I think we're seeing the battle differently.
> 
> I was trying to say that Megatron is leaning with his back to the 
> ship, on top of the wing, and i saw Tyrael's position as being on 
> the other side of the base, across from where Megatron was. So 
> Megatron would be hiding and poking his weapons over to fire at the 
> moment, having some protection against weaponfire. 
> 
> Essentially, SS couldn't have gotten behind him, grabbed his wrist 
> (which would be a mode anyway), and fired a laser at the back of his 
> neck etc. I guess I need to work on my posting some more then to 
> make stuff like that clearer.
> 
> This is, of course, provided that Tyrael is where I had thought he 
> was. If not, we have a minor problem. =p
